name: 5etools
author: TheGiddyLimit
description: A site dedicated to making playing games with your friends as easy as possible.

scripts.test:css: npm run test:css:lint && npm run test:css:format
scripts.lint:css: npm run lint:css:format && npm run lint:css:lint
scripts.test: npm run test:js && npm run test:unit && npm run test:css && npm run test:data
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:data
scripts.build:css: sass --style=compressed scss/:css/ && node node/rm.js css/includes/ css/vars/
scripts.build: npm run clean-jsons && npm run gen && npm run build:css && npm run build:sw:prod
scripts.spellcheck:check-data: echo "This can take a few minutes." && npx cspell --no-progress --show-context --show-suggestions "data/**/*.json"
scripts.spellcheck:check-data-quick: git diff --name-only | grep -P "^data/[^.]+.json" | npx cspell --no-progress --show-context --show-suggestions --file-list stdin
scripts.spellcheck:trust-data: echo "This can take a few minutes." && echo "# new words on $(date)" >> spellcheck/dnd-words.txt && npx cspell --words-only --unique "./data/**/*.json" | sort --ignore-case >> spellcheck/dnd-words.txt
